title: Ahmedabad plane crash: Police finds one survivor in seat 11A; 242 were onboard
content: An Air India Boeing 787 Dreamliner, carrying 242 people, crashed in a residential area of Ahmedabad shortly after takeoff on Thursday afternoon. The London-bound flight (AI171) went down near Sardar Vallabhbhai Patel International Airport, causing a large fire. While initial reports suggested no survivors, authorities confirmed one person, Ramesh Vishwakumar, was found alive and is receiving treatment.

title: Ahmedabad air crash: Ex-Gujarat CM Vijay Rupani among victims, confirms BJP
content: Former Gujarat Chief Minister and BJP leader Vijay Rupani tragically died in the Air India plane crash in Ahmedabad shortly after takeoff, confirmed by top BJP leaders. Rupani was en route to London to visit his family when the accident occurred. The crash involved 242 individuals, including passengers and crew, marking a significant loss for the BJP and Indian politics.

title: 'Why was landing gear down?': Experts on what may have caused crash
content: An Air India plane crashed in Gujarat. Aviation experts are questioning the incident. The crash occurred shortly after takeoff. Experts emphasize the importance of flight recorders. A former pilot noted a possible loss of power. The landing gear position is unusual. Investigators are working to determine the cause. The aircraft was at 600 feet.

title: AI flight crashed into doctors' hostel, many feared dead
content: An Air India Boeing 787 Dreamliner, flight AI171 to London, crashed shortly after takeoff from Ahmedabad's Sardar Vallabhbhai Patel International Airport on Thursday. The plane, carrying 232 passengers and 10 crew members, went down in Meghaninagar, impacting residential quarters of doctors from BJ Medical College.

title: Ahmedabad plane crash: What is Blackbox; what makes it crucial evidence
content: An Air India flight AI-171, a Boeing 787-8 Dreamliner, crashed after taking off from Ahmedabad airport. The flight was headed to London Gatwick. All 242 people on board are feared dead. Rescue operations are underway. Investigators are prioritizing the recovery of the black box. The black box holds vital clues to determine the cause of the crash.

title: Ahmedabad plane crash: Tata announces Rs 1 cr compensation to kin of deceased
content: Following the devastating Air India Flight 171 crash in Gujarat, the Tata Group has announced a compensation of Rs 1 crore for each victim's family. Chairman N Chandrasekaran conveyed his condolences and pledged support for the injured, including covering medical expenses. The group will also contribute to rebuilding the B J Medical's hostel impacted by the crash.

title: Air India Plane crash: Flightradar shares update on ‘safety protocol’ followed
content: Air India Flight AI 171, a Boeing 787-8 Dreamliner, crashed in Meghani Nagar after leaving Ahmedabad. The flight was headed to London with 242 passengers and 12 crew. Flightradar data shows the plane used the full runway length. The pilot made a MAYDAY call. Videos show smoke at the crash site. Emergency services responded quickly.

title: Ahmedabad crash: Air India flight lost signal at 625 feet, within a minute of takeoff
content: An Air India flight AI171 bound for London Gatwick crashed shortly after takeoff from Ahmedabad airport on Thursday, impacting a residential area in Meghaninagar. The crash occurred around 2:00 pm, with the aircraft losing signal at a low altitude. Rescue operations are underway, with multiple fire tenders deployed to control the blaze.

title: 'Dead bodies scattered all over': Eyewitness on Ahmedabad plane crash
content: Tragedy struck Ahmedabad as an Air India flight, en route to London, crashed shortly after takeoff from Sardar Vallabhbhai Patel International Airport. The aircraft plummeted into a hostel in the Meghani area, resulting in a massive fire and widespread debris. Eyewitnesses reported a scene of devastation with smoke, scattered debris, and casualties.

title: WTC Final: Cummins claims fifer, surpasses Indian great on elite list
content: Pat Cummins delivered a remarkable bowling display at Lord's. He took six wickets, dismantling South Africa's batting lineup. His performance helped Australia dominate the World Test Championship final. Cummins achieved his 14th five-wicket haul in Tests. He equalled Richie Benaud's record as captain. South Africa collapsed, scoring only 138 runs. Cummins also claimed his 300th Test wicket.

title: Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang: There’s a new programming language. It is called…
content: Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang recently highlighted AI's transformative potential, stating it democratizes programming by enabling users to instruct computers using natural language. He likened programming AI to guiding a person, emphasizing the ease with which AI can now perform complex tasks like writing poems.

title: AI plane with 242 onboard crashes soon after takeoff
content: An Air India Ahmedabad-London flight crashed shortly after takeoff from Sardar Vallabhbhai Patel International Airport in Ahmedabad. The aircraft went down in the Meghani area, sending a dark plume of smoke visible for kilometers. Emergency services have rushed to the scene. As of now, there's no official confirmation on casualties or the cause of the crash.

title: AI plane crash: 787 Dreamliner is Boeing’s flagship product - 10 things to know
content: An Air India Boeing 787 Dreamliner, flight AI 171 bound for London, tragically crashed shortly after takeoff in Ahmedabad. This marks the first fatal accident involving the 787 Dreamliner, causing Boeing's shares to plummet.

title: Ahmedabad plane crash: Passenger list released, includes ex-CM Vijay Rupani
content: Air India flight AI 171, a Boeing 787 Dreamliner, tragically crashed shortly after takeoff from Ahmedabad en route to London, carrying 242 passengers and crew, including former Gujarat CM Vijay Rupani. The flight encountered a catastrophic failure, prompting immediate rescue operations and a formal investigation by DGCA and Boeing.

title: London-bound AI plane had 53 British nationals; UK PM calls it ‘devastating’
content: Following the devastating Air India plane crash in Ahmedabad, UK Prime Minister Keir Starmer expressed his condolences, stating his thoughts are with the passengers and their families during this distressing time. The London-bound flight carried 52 British nationals.

title: Sirianni praises rookie’s mindset; Eagles see star potential post-surgery
content: The Philadelphia Eagles' first-round pick, Jihaad Campbell, is currently sidelined due to offseason shoulder surgery, delaying his NFL debut. Despite the physical setback, the Eagles are prioritizing Campbell's mental preparation through film study and walkthroughs. Coaches emphasize his versatility and future role as an inside linebacker, ensuring he's ready to contribute upon his return.

title: Watch: 14-yo Suryavanshi breathes fire with bat; video goes viral
content: Vaibhav Suryavanshi, a 14-year-old cricket prodigy, is making waves in India. He recently smashed 190 off 90 balls in a practice match, adding to his already impressive record. Earlier this year, he became the youngest T20 centurion and shone in his IPL debut, solidifying his status as a rising star with remarkable performances across different formats.

title: AI plane crash: Boeing shares plunge; stock tanks 5% in opening trade
content: Air India's Boeing 787-8 Dreamliner, operating as Flight AI171 from Ahmedabad to London, crashed shortly after takeoff on June 12, 2025, prompting a 5% plunge in Boeing's stock in opening trade.

title: Easwaran at no. 3, no place for Shardul: Ex-India coach predicts India's XI vs ENG
content: Former India batting coach Sanjay Bangar has revealed his predicted playing XI for the upcoming Test series against England. Bangar's selection notably omits Shardul Thakur, favouring Nitish Kumar Reddy. The series marks a new era for Indian cricket with Shubman Gill as captain and Rishabh Pant as vice-captain. Jasprit Bumrah will not play in every match.

title: Ahmedabad plane crash: Authorities issue helpline numbers
content: Following the Air India plane crash in Gujarat shortly after takeoff, both Air India and the civil aviation ministry promptly released helpline numbers for public assistance. Air India established a dedicated passenger hotline, 1800 5691 444, while the civil aviation ministry activated helpline 9974111327.

title: AI plane crash: IndiGo, SpiceJet issue travel advisories; Ahmedabad airport now open
content: Flight operations at Ahmedabad Airport were suspended after an Air India plane crashed shortly after takeoff on Thursday. IndiGo and SpiceJet have issued travel advisories, offering rebooking or refunds. According to the latest update, limited flight operations have now resumed at the airport.

title: Salman Khan cancels event in solidarity towards Ahmedabad plane crash
content: An Air India Boeing 787-8 Dreamliner en route to London with 230 passengers and 12 crew members crashed after taking off from Ahmedabad at 1:38 pm. Following the tragic event, numerous celebrities expressed their support and condolences. In response to the crash, Salman Khan cancelled his scheduled appearance at a brand event in Mumbai as a gesture of solidarity.

title: IND vs ENG: Interesting facts about all 5 venues; some may amaze you
content: India's 2025 tour of England marks a generational shift with Shubman Gill captaining a team facing tough English conditions. England aims to dominate this red-ball season, including the Ashes. The series will be held across five historic venues, each with unique stories, from Headingley's football mishap to The Oval hosting England's first Test.

title: SBI Clerk Mains Score Card 2025 released, check your scores and marks here
content: The State Bank of India (SBI) has released the SBI Clerk Mains Score Card 2025 on its official website, sbi.co.in. Candidates who appeared for the mains exam held on April 10 and 12 can now check their individual marks and download the score card. The exam assessed General Awareness, English, Quantitative Aptitude, and Reasoning. This score card marks a crucial stage in the recruitment process for 13,735 Junior Associate vacancies across SBI branches nationwide.

title: 'Father led 4 young sons to railway tracks': Before Faridabad horror, a calm & routine morning
content: In Faridabad, Manoj Mehto took his four sons to railway tracks. He bought them chips and cola. Then, he held them firmly as the Golden Temple Express approached. The train ran them over, killing them all. Police are investigating the motive. Preeti, Manoj's wife, is left alone. Neighbors are shocked and offer condolences.

title: Air India plane crash: Railways to run special trains for stranded passengers
content: An Air India plane crashed shortly after takeoff from Ahmedabad airport, leading to a temporary suspension of all flight operations. Indian Railways will operate special air-conditioned trains to transport stranded passengers. Flight AI 171, bound for London Gatwick, crashed outside the airport boundary after issuing a mayday signal.

title: Bengaluru stampede: Karnataka HC grants interim bail to RCB official; orders surrendering of passport
content: The Karnataka High Court has granted interim release to four individuals, including Royal Challengers Bengaluru's marketing head, Nikhil Sosale, who were arrested in connection with the Bengaluru stampede during RCB's victory parade. The court ordered their release from judicial custody, stipulating the surrender of their passports.

title: 'Thug Life' box office collection day 8 (live)
content: Mani Ratnam's 'Thug Life,' starring Kamal Haasan, had a grand opening. Silambarasan's performance received praise. However, the film experienced a significant drop in collections after the opening weekend. Weekday earnings declined considerably. The film's OTT rights are with Netflix. Poor box office performance may lead to an earlier digital release than anticipated. The movie features music by AR Rahman.

title: UP shocker: Cop throws 16-year-old off roof after she complains of harassment; critical
content: In Lucknow's Chinhat area, a 16-year-old girl suffered severe spinal injuries after allegedly being thrown off a roof by a policeman, Mukesh Yadav, who has been arrested. The girl's mother alleges Yadav harassed her daughter and assaulted the family along with his wife and brother-in-law, leading to the incident.

title: Watch: Moment Air India plane crashed near Ahmedabad airport
content: An Air India Boeing 787 Dreamliner, en route from Ahmedabad to London, tragically crashed shortly after takeoff in the Meghani area. Carrying over 240 passengers, the wide-body aircraft's heavy fuel load intensified the post-crash fire, hindering rescue operations. Authorities, including the DGCA and Boeing, have launched investigations, while the central government pledges full support to Gujarat in managing the disaster.

title: Nifty50 goes below 24,900; Sensex sinks 900 points - Top 5 reasons stock market is falling
content: Stock market crash today: Nifty50 and BSE Sensex, the Indian equity benchmark indices, tanked in trade on Thursday. While Nifty50 went below 24,900, BSE Sensex tanked over 900 points intraday.

title: AI plane crash: Ahmedabad airport resumes limited flight ops; here's what we know
content: A major incident occurred in Ahmedabad. An Air India flight AI171, bound for London, crashed after takeoff. The Boeing 787 Dreamliner went down in the Meghaninagar area. Airport operations were suspended. Emergency services responded quickly.

title: 'We are ready': Iran’s veiled warning on reports of Israel preparing strike
content: Amid heightened regional tensions, Israel is reportedly prepared to launch an operation into Iran, prompting US concerns about potential retaliation against American sites in Iraq. The US State Department has advised non-emergency personnel to leave Iraq, while President Trump asserts that Iran cannot possess nuclear weapons.

title: Netflix to release Jerry Jones, Dallas Cowboys documentary series on August 19
content: Netflix is set to release a documentary series, 'America's Team: The Gambler and His Cowboys,' on August 19, chronicling Jerry Jones' acquisition and transformation of the Dallas Cowboys into an NFL powerhouse. The series features insights from key figures like Troy Aikman, Emmitt Smith, and Jimmy Johnson, alongside a special appearance by George W. Bush.

title: Ahmedabad plane crash: 'Deeply anguished' - Sports fraternity reacts
content: An Air India Boeing 787 Dreamliner, flight AI171, tragically crashed shortly after takeoff from Ahmedabad, bound for London Gatwick. The crash into a populated area resulted in a massive fire, with 242 people onboard. Rescue operations are underway as authorities investigate the cause, while the nation mourns the devastating loss and offers support to affected families.

title: Ahmedabad plane crash: AI pilot gave Mayday call; ATC response went unanswered
content: An Air India B787, flight AI-171, crashed immediately after takeoff from Ahmedabad, en route to Gatwick. The Directorate General of Civil Aviation (DGCA) reported 242 individuals were aboard. The aircraft, commanded by Captain Sumeet Sabharwal, issued a MAYDAY call before losing contact with ATC.

title: Air India Ahmedabad-London Gatwick plane crash; here's what airlines said
content: Air India flight AI171, en route from Ahmedabad to London Gatwick, was involved in a crash shortly after takeoff on June 12, 2025. The Boeing 787-8 Dreamliner, carrying 242 individuals, including crew, experienced the incident. The Directorate General of Civil Aviation (DGCA) confirmed the crash and deployed NDRF teams to the Ahmedabad airport crash site.

title: Woman strangled, found in bedsheet-wrapped suitcase in Ghaziabad
content: Ghaziabad police have registered a murder case after a woman's body was discovered in a suitcase along Canal Road. The autopsy revealed the cause of death to be strangulation and suffocation. Authorities believe the woman, approximately 25 years old, was murdered on Monday night, and four teams have been formed to investigate, focusing on CCTV footage and identifying the victim.

title: ‘Villa, flats, 19 plots, 16-acre land, gold, crores in bank’: Telangana engineer held
content: Anti-Corruption Bureau teams raided the residence of Nune Sridhar, a senior irrigation engineer involved in the Kaleshwaram Lift Irrigation Project, unearthing assets worth approximately ₹60 crore disproportionate to his known income sources. Sridhar, who previously supervised the Gayathri pump house, was arrested following searches at 14 locations across multiple cities. The raids occurred amidst an inquiry into alleged KLIP irregularities.

title: Watch: Who is Vijay Rupani, ex Gujarat CM, killed in Ahmedabad plane crash?
content: He was among the 242 people aboard the ill-fated London-bound Air India I71 flight that crashed minutes after it took off from Ahmedabad

title: Grief grips Pullad as news of Ranjitha’s death emerges
content: Ranjitha, a nurse on State government employment, was on long leave and working in the United Kingdom for the past year. She had rejoined govt. service and was about to resign her job in the U.K.

title: Speeding SUV with BJP flag kills woman constable in Patna; three arrested
content: Vehicle mows down police team during night checking drive; murder case registered, fourth accused absconding

title: Warehousing facility near Chala market to be ready by August
content: About 25% of work of the much-delayed project has been completed. Perishable cargo along with other commodities destined for Chala and Palayam markets can be unloaded and stored at the facility.

title: Police told to be prompt in filing charge sheets
content: Annamayya Additional SP (Administration) highlights the need for quick resolution of pending cases with scientific evidence, besides the importance of enhancing public trust in policing

title: Learn governance from Modi, Somanna tells Siddaramaiah
content: Minister of State for Railways has advised the Chief Minister to stay in Delhi for eight days and watch how administration is carried out there

title: The Hindu Classroom project launched
content: Initiative aims to enhance general awareness and language skills of students through daily exposure to quality journalism

title: Pemmasani lays stone for Shaadi Khana at Prattipadu in Guntur district
content: The Union Minister of State for Rural Development and Communications lauds contributions of two families that donated land and funds for the construction of the facility for the Muslim community

title: Heavy rain hits life in Raibag, Kudchi; bridge over Malaprabha comes under water
content: Red alert today for Uttara Kannada, Udupi, Dakshina Kannada, Belagavi, Dharwad, Gadag, Chikkamagaluru, Kodagu, Shivamogga districts

title: Recover all expenses in the wake of two ship accidents from owner firms, says Kerala HC
content: Along with the Union govt., the State can also initiate measures for this and any further delay will set a wrong precedent, says HC

title: NIA charge-sheets another accused in RSS leader murder case
content: Rafeek M. S. has been charged under various sections of the Indian Penal Code and Unlawful Activities (Prevention) Act for the murder of Sreenivasan

title: 19,000 rice bags supplied to government schools, welfare hostels in Annamayya district: Joint Collector
content: To strictly curb the menace of diversion of the stocks and to maintain transparency, the rice bags are equipped with QR codes and GPS tracking system, says Adarsh Rajendran

title: Vacant teacher posts in primary, high schools a major issue in education sector in Yadgir
content: The district has been facing shortage for many years now and the State government has to take immediate steps to improve results

title: Political leaders in Andhra Pradesh condole loss of lives in tragic plane crash in Ahmadabad
content: Chief Minister Chandrababu Naidu, Deputy Chief Minister Pawan Kalyan, and other leaders extend their sympathies to the families of passengers, crew members and all those affected by the devastating incident

title: AP retired employees seek restoration of pension benefits
content: The pension hike would benefit 70,000 retirees immediately and help around 3.3 lakh other retired staff when they reach 70 years. The financial implication for the government would be around ₹120 crore, says Andhra Pradesh Retired Employees Association’s Joint Action Committee State Chairman Chowdary Purushottam Naidu

title: Pacers ride Mathurin, bench to Game 3 victory
content: Bennedict Mathurin scored 27 points, leading a Pacers team that enjoyed a whopping 49-18 edge in bench points, as Indiana reclaimed the lead in the NBA Finals by beating Oklahoma City 116-107 in Game 3.

title: OKC points to 'unforced errors' amid unraveling
content: The Thunder were outscored 32-18 in the fourth quarter Wednesday night as they lost to the Pacers in Game 3 of the NBA Finals.

title: Sources: Jets owner Johnson eyes Palace stake
content: Woody Johnson, the owner of the New York Jets NFL team, is in talks over a £200 million ($272m) investment in Crystal Palace, sources have told ESPN.

title: Poland manager quits after Lewandowski dispute
content: Poland manager Michal Probierz resigned on Thursday following a row over his decision to replace the country's record goalscorer Robert Lewandowski as captain.

title: Dobbins defends claim father played for Yankees
content: Red Sox rookie Hunter Dobbins said there is nothing nefarious about the connections he said his father had to the Yankees despite a report saying the claims were nefarious.

title: Bueckers hot in return, explodes for 35 in loss
content: Back after missing four games, Paige Bueckers made her first six shots and finished with 35 points Wednesday night in a 93-80 loss to the Mercury.

title: McIntosh breaks 3rd swim world record in 5 days
content: Summer McIntosh made it three world records in less than a week when she broke her own 400-meter individual medley mark at the Canadian swimming trials.

title: How Rick Carlisle's past impacts Tyrese Haliburton's present
content: From his time with point guards Jason Kidd and Luka Doncic in Dallas, Rick Carlisle's experience has made him the ideal coach for Tyrese Haliburton.

title: TAA at Madrid unveiling: 'Dream come true'
content: Trent Alexander-Arnold said playing for Real Madrid was a "dream come true" on Thursday, saying he's "ready to win a lot of trophies" after signing a six-year contract at the club.

title: Tuchel: My mom finds Bellingham rage 'repulsive'
content: England manager Thomas Tuchel has said he understands criticism of Jude Bellingham after the midfielder's emotions boiled over during the shock defeat to Senegal on Tuesday.

title: Sporting demand more than $80M for Gyökeres
content: Sporting CP striker Viktor Gyökeres will not be available for €70 million ($80m) this summer, the club's president has warned amid interest from Manchester United.

title: Miami owner 'fully expects' MLS calendar shift
content: Inter Miami co-owner Jorge Mas said he expects MLS will soon agree to align with the international soccer calendar.

title: Gold Cup monitoring L.A. protests before opener
content: Concacaf said on Wednesday it was in "close and ongoing communication" with local officials as protests in Los Angeles continue ahead of the Gold Cup's opening match at SoFi Stadium.

title: Grealish left out of Man City Club World Cup squad
content: Jack Grealish has been left out of Manchester City's 28-man squad for the Club World Cup, the Premier League side confirmed on Wednesday.

title: Why is there no transfer buzz around Osimhen and Vlahovic? Blame their contracts
content: Victor Osimhen and Dusan Vlahovic are rare scoring talents who have their prime years ahead. Yet both are trapped in unusual situations that are unfairly impacting their transfer appeal.

content: Inter Miami tends to reserve him for the bigger games and competitions -- like this summer's Club World Cup.

content: The Karnataka government has imposed new restrictions on activities in Bengaluru's iconic Cubbon Park to curb its commercialisation and misuse.

content: Ahmedabad Air India Plane Crash Live Updates: A plane crashed near Ahmedabad airport on Thursday afternoon, officials said. Rescue operations are underway.

title: Air India Ahmedabad-London Plane Crash: What We Know So Far
content: An Air India Boeing 787-8 Dreamliner operating as Flight AI171 from Ahmedabad to London's Gatwick Airport crashed shortly after takeoff this afternoon. The aircraft was carrying 232 passengers and 10 crew members.

title: Air India Flight With 242 On Board Crashes In Ahmedabad, 1 Survivor
content: An Air India Boeing 787-8 Dreamliner carrying 242 people crashed immediately after taking off from Ahmedabad airport. The flight was going to London. There were 232 passengers and 10 crew, the Directorate General of Civil Aviation (DGCA) said.

title: Western Railway To Operate 2 Special Trains From Ahmedabad After Plane Crash
content: Western Railway will run two Superfast Special trains from Ahmedabad to Delhi and Mumbai to ease the passenger traffic after an Air India plane crashed shortly after taking off from Sardar Vallabhbhai International Airport on Thursday afternoon.

title: Gujarat Ex Chief Minister Vijay Rupani Among 241 Killed In Air India Crash
content: BJP's Vijay Rupani, a former Chief Minister of Gujarat, was among passengers killed in the Air India Boeing 787-8 Dreamliner that crashed shortly after take-off from the Ahmedabad airport.

title: "Where Have You Gone?" Family Of Airhostess On Crashed Air India Plane
content: They are on their knees on the floor, frantically flipping through photo albums. Tears continue to stream down their faces as they search for her picture: Nganthoi Sharma Kongbrailatpam, a crew member on Air India plane that crashed in Ahmedabad.

title: New Bride, Headed To London To Meet Husband, On Board Flight That Crashed
content: The London-bound Air India AI-171 flight that crashed minutes after take-off in Ahmedabad, ended many hopes and dreams. A city police officer said there are no survivors.

title: Boeing 787-8, Which Crashed In Ahmedabad, Had Immaculate Safety Record
content: The Air India Ahmedabad-London flight crashed this afternoon, marking the Boeing 787-8 Dreamliner's first fatal crash since the aircraft's debut in 2011.

title: "Deeply Shocked": S Jaishankar On Air India Plane Crash
content: External Affairs Minister S Jaishankar on Thursday said he is "deeply shocked" to learn about the Air India flight that crashed minutes after taking off from the Ahmedabad airport.

title: 65-Year-Old US Man Convicted After Molesting Woman On Flight
content: William RMcKelvy, 65, was on a flight when he started molesting a woman sitting next to him, according to the US Attorney's Office, Northern District of Texas. He groped her breast and inner thigh on four different occasions.

title: Lack Of Lift, Pilots Yanking Yoke: What May Have Happened In Plane's Cockpit
content: Air India flight AI-171, from Ahmedabad to Gawtick, crashed shortly after take-off, having achieved a height of just 672 feet, and NDTV has - based on expert testimony - pieced together what may have happened in the last few seconds in the cockpit.

title: Ahmedabad Plane Crash: 11 Biggest Aviation Tragedies In India's History
content: An Air India flight crashed shortly after takeoff from Ahmedabad's Sardar Vallabhbhai Patel International Airport on Thursday. The Boeing 787-8 Dreamliner was headed to London Gatwick with 242 people on board.

content: An Air India Boeing 787-8 Dreamliner flying to London crashed shortly after taking off from the Ahmedabad airport.

title: Here are the big stories from Karnataka today
content: Welcome to the Karnataka Today newsletter, your guide from The Hindu on the major news stories to follow today. Curated and written by Nalme Nachiyar.

title: Ship on fire: salvage operation delayed as salvor’s vessel runs out of fuel
content: Director General of Shipping writes to ship owners saying that  Offshore Warrior  had limited firefighting capability and lacked foam to contain spread of fire. He warns of criminal liability proceedings and other punitive measures against parties concerned

title: PD Act slapped on red sanders smuggler from Tamil Nadu
content: Accused has been found to be involved in several instances of smuggling and his name mentioned in more than 10 cases pertaining to violation of the Wildlife Act, according to RSASTF

title: GSK partners  Bharat Biotech for Shigella vaccine
content: Hyderabad-based vaccine maker to lead further development of GSK’s Shigella vaccine candidate altSonflex1-2-3, including Phase 3 clinical trials, regulatory advancement and large-scale manufacturing

title: Entrepreneurship is not a choice, but a national necessity, says founder-Chairman of Cyient Mohan Reddy
content: The tie-up with AICTE to establish an innovation cluster in Visakhapatnam is in line with the State government’s thrust on building the supporting infrastructure to make optimum use of human resources that will generate jobs, drive innovation and create wealth, he asserts

title: To bring forth a ‘mindset change,’ women to pedal on Fort Kochi streets at night
